headline: Record Profitability and Major Buybacks Might Change The Case For Investing In W. R. Berkley (WRB)
summary: W. R. Berkley recently reported fourth-quarter 2025 results showing revenue of US$3,721.41 million and net income of US$449.51 million, alongside completing a long-running share repurchase program totaling 161,482,852 shares for US$4.33 billion since 2006. The quarter capped a year in which the insurer delivered higher full-year revenue and earnings per share while returning US$608 million to investors through dividends and buybacks in the final three months alone. We’ll now examine how...
